data.name: Golf 5
data.description:
Golf 5 is a fully immersive golf experience partnered with R&A, DPWorld Tour and Me and My Golf. 
Learn the basics or improve your golf game with real swing analysis and shot feedback. 
Play individually or with friends on the world-renowned St. Andrews Old Course. 
Compete in events such as the VR Open and DP World Tour Championship. 
Climb the ranks in the Golf Metaverse Ranking, certified by the International eGolf Federation

Fresh update:
Now available Royal Troon, the home of The Open 2024 edition. 
A historic and challenging links course with a rich tradition. Be part of The 152nd Open by playing and competing in our stunning VR replica of Royal Troon

Includes
•	3 iconic real golf courses (DLC) The Old Course, Royal Liverpool and Royal Troon
•	4 FREE Golf5 original courses
•	The Open Zone, with The Open courses from 2023
•	Driving range and Putting green
•	Wood, Iron, Pitch and Putt version 
•	Game modes Match Play, Medal Play and Stableford
•	Single and Multiplayer modes: compete with friends around the world
•	Improve your handicap and receive complimentary Callaway Club Sets 
•	3 Pin positions 
And
• Participate in thrilling tournaments
• Golf launch manager: Real-time swing data with Xtra Tracking Info
• Unique full Swing: Real golf physics with HPC 
• Live broadcast, score info, drone view
• Dynamic wind factor
• Club shop: G5 coins, VR Clubs
• Multi-language: English, Spanish, Japanese, Korean
